time.Description: Time in relation to time zero defined by the _pet.json

plasma_radioactivity.Description: Radioactivity in plasma samples. Measured using COBRA counter.

whole_blood_radioactivity.Description: Radioactivity in whole blood samples. Measured using COBRA counter.

metabolite_polar_fraction.Description: Polar metabolite fraction of the radiotracer.

metabolite_lipophilic_fraction.Description: Lipophilic metabolite fraction of the radiotracer.
